price: Lẹ́yìn náà, ní Ọjọ́ Àjíǹde dájúdájú ẹ̀yin yóò máa bá ara yín ṣe àríyànjiyàn ní ọ̀dọ̀ Olúwa yín.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ عِندَ رَبِّكُمۡ تَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma innakum yawma al-qiyāmati ʿinda rabbikum takhtaṣimūna
